summary:
The Harry Potter movies are based on J.K. Rowling's popular books. There are eight magical movies in total, released between 2001 and 2011. The story follows Harry Potter and his friends, Ron and Hermione, as they go on adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The series stars Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, and Emma Watson.

The final book, *Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows*, was made into two movies. The second part became one of the highest-grossing films ever, making over $1 billion. The series is a huge success and has made a lot of money worldwide.
title: Harry Potter (film series)
